wallet.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a small flat case, often made of leather, that you carry in your pocket, for holding paper money, bank cards etc
wallet.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He took a credit card out of his wallet.
I’ve only got about £10 in my wallet.
wallet.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a case for documents, often made of leather or plastic
